mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.fk_project_id AS "project.id", p.name AS "project.name", a.name AS "name", a.price AS "price", a.level AS "level", a.start_using AS "startUsing", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
INNER JOIN reserve_project as p on p.id=a.fk_project_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve_tutor( id, fk_project_id, name, price, level, start_using, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, tenant_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{project.id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{level}, #{startUsing}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{tenantId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve_tutor SET fk_project_id = #{project.id}, name = #{name}, price = #{price}, level = #{level}, start_using = #{startUsing}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, tenant_id = #{tenantId} WHERE id = #{id}
